name: Stij Of The Dump
description:
Dig to find your harddrive and solve the puzzle levels along the way.
Yes, you will have to close with alt+F4... sorry about that.
Most of the models and textures we did not make but found free.
A bit jank, and very likely to crash.
ENJOY!
